title: Do Politicians Respond to Hostility? Evidence from Germany
abstract: Violence and incivility against politicians are recurrent; we know little about short-term effects. We test whether politicians change their communication—volume and content—after attacks, using DiD and 5,500+ offline attacks linked to 1,000+ German politicians (2021–2025).
